mapper.select: SELECT f.FAQID, c.CODENAME, f.QUESTION, f.CREATEDAT, f.STATUS FROM FAQ f JOIN CODEDETAIL c ON f.GROUPCODE = c.GROUPCODE AND f.FAQCATEGORY = c.code ORDER BY f.FAQID DESC OFFSET #{pageRequestDTO.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageRequestDTO.size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ (GROUPCODE, FAQCATEGORY, QUESTION, ANSWER) VALUES (#{groupCode}, #{faqCategory}, #{question}, #{answer})
